name: The Long Road and the Forest demo
name_original: The Long Road and the Forest demo
description:
The Long Road and the Forest 

This is a prelude demo For Windows and macOS.

The Long Road and the Forest is a retro mystery adventure game about a small town in eastern Europe.

Mariska has lived with her father since the death of her mother in her childhood. Her father went missing in the forest three weeks ago. Mariska must find him and solve the mystery of his absence. 

Controls

Left click - Use, Pick up, Talk to.

Right click - Look at.

Development

This game is still in development. This is demo version, a prelude to the story.

Credits

Video footage - Public domain - Prelinger archives.
